## IMapRenderingManager.render() method

The method to call to render the map. This method depends on an `isStaticFrame` boolean that notifies the pass manager to switch to a higher level render quality for the last frame.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
render(renderer: THREE.WebGLRenderer, scene: THREE.Scene, camera: THREE.PerspectiveCamera | THREE.OrthographicCamera, isStaticFrame: boolean, time?: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  renderer | THREE.WebGLRenderer | The ThreeJS WebGLRenderer instance to render the map with. |
|  scene | THREE.Scene |  |
|  camera | THREE.PerspectiveCamera \| THREE.OrthographicCamera |  |
|  isStaticFrame | boolean | Whether the frame to render is static or dynamic. Selects level of antialiasing. |
|  time | number | Optional time argument provided by the requestAnimationFrame, to pass to sub-passes. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
